title: Lisa Gardner-3 Truths and a Lie [Epub]
description:
Lisa Gardner-3 Truths and a Lie


Boston Detective D.D. Warren faces her most brutal adversaries yetâ€”a class of jaded thriller writersâ€”in New York Times Bestselling Author Lisa Gardner's exclusive e-Book short story
In Lisa Gardner's second short story, after the New York Times bestseller The 7th Month, Detective D.D. Warren takes on her most intimidating assignment yet: a fifty-minute class meant to educate a horde of bloodthirsty thriller writers on the ways of actual police work. Yet sometimes life really does imitate fiction, as D.D. takes the writers through the reality of one of her most twisted casesâ€”a case that involves a seedy motel room, drugs, prostitution . . . and a severed leg
